hero.title: Transform your vision into reality with our creative design, web development and custom graphic solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Creative solutions tailored to your needs

webDesign.title: Web Design
webDesign.description: Modern, responsive websites optimized for all devices. We create exceptional user experiences that convert visitors into loyal customers.

infographie.title: Graphic Design
infographie.description: Logos, flyers, business cards, brochures... We bring your visual identity to life with unique and impactful designs that perfectly reflect your brand values.

photographie.title: Photography
photographie.description: Professional images to showcase your products, services or events. A picture is worth a thousand words, let us tell your visual story in a captivating way.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Who are we?
about.description: AstraForge is a passionate creative agency, dedicated to excellence and innovation in custom web design and development.

expertise.title: Global expertise
expertise.description: Our international team brings a unique perspective to each project, combining the latest global trends with a local approach tailored to your specific needs.

speed.title: Fast solutions
speed.description: We deliver projects on time without ever compromising on quality, thanks to our optimized work process and highly qualified team.

support.title: Personalized support
support.description: We listen to your needs and accompany you at every stage of your project with personalized follow-up and expert advice to guarantee your satisfaction.

price.title: Transparent pricing
price.description: Our rates are clear and adapted to your budget, with no hidden fees or unpleasant surprises. We offer you tailor-made solutions that respect your financial constraints.

process.title: My Work Process
process.description: A methodical approach for optimal results

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from our satisfied clients
testimonials.quote1: AstraForge completely transformed our online presence. Our new website is not only beautiful, but it has also increased our conversion rate by 40%. Their team is professional, responsive and truly attentive to our needs.
testimonials.quote2: Working with AstraForge has been an exceptional experience. Their creativity and technical expertise brought our vision to life in a way we never imagined. I highly recommend them to any business looking to stand out online.
